name: Tweetfighter 2 Turbo
description:
Tweetfighter 2 Turbo

Under 560 characters as part of #tweettweetjam4

Battle with all your favorite boulevard brawlers:

  • Reeyoo
  • Chun  T
  • Blonka
  • Barbie's Husband
  • and many more!

➡️- move right

⬅️- move left and block

Be close- attack

Be too close- get attacked
